readable.title: 1015118661_980735411b
readable.content: A boy smiles in front of a stony wall in a city . A little boy is standing on the street while a man in overalls is working on a stone wall . A young boy runs aross the street . A young child is walking on a stone paved street with a metal pole and a man behind him . Smiling boy in white shirt and blue jeans in front of rock wall with man in overalls behind him .
